title: Drawing, Design for China Cabinet with Convex Front, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for China Cabinet with Convex Front
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right of design: carved out; in pen and black ink, lower center and right of design: inlay; in graphite, lower center of sheet: $165; in graphite, lower right of sheet: 4.0 wide [crossed out] / 5.0 high [crossed out]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oblong cabinet with convex center front, raised on 4 short tapering legs and has 3 shelves; top carved; center bottom inlaid with medallion suspended on floral garlands.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for China Cabinet with Convex Front, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-203
